sentence.Network_en: It will produce electricity more cheaply than a nuclear plant.
sentence.Network_cn: 它的发电成本要比核电站低。

sentence.Network_en: I'm sure I could buy this more cheaply somewhere else.
sentence.Network_cn: 我相信我能在别的地方更便宜地买到这种物品。

sentence.Network_en: She is an economical housekeeper and feeds her family cheaply.
sentence.Network_cn: 她节约持家,一家人吃得很省.

I bought this car very cheaply ., 我买的这辆车非常便宜.

list.abs: This process might produce hydrogen more cheaply , but its feasibility has not yet proved., 这种方式或许能更便宜地生产氢 , 但目前还无法证明它的可行性.
it raises overall income and allows Americans to buy wider range of better goods more cheaply .贸易增加了收入总量，美国人可以以更低廉的价格买到更丰富的商品。

so , assuming they still have some gold to sell into the market to keep the price down , you may have an opportunity to buy more gold cheaply for a while longer yet !因此，假设他们仍然有一些黄金销售进入市场，以保持价格下跌，你可以有机会购买更多的黄金便宜了一段时间较长，但！
He found out where to buy fruit cheaply ., 他打听出在哪儿买水果便宜.

the transformation is most apparent in the boom towns that tied their fortunes to making one product cheaply , from Guangdongprovince in the south to Honghe's environs in the Yangtze River Delta .这样的变化在依靠某廉价产品致富的新兴城镇身上最为明显，从华南的广东省到长江三角洲的洪合县都是如此。

entry.def: Goods or services that are cheap cost less money than usual or than you expected.

example.ex: I'm going to live off campus if I can find somewhere cheap enough...
example.tran: 要是能找到足够便宜的地方，我就不在校园里住了。

example.ex: Smoke detectors are cheap and easy to put up...
example.tran: 烟雾报警器既不贵又易于安装。

entry.def: If you describe goods as cheap, you mean they cost less money than similar products but their quality is poor.

example.ex: Don't resort to cheap copies; save up for the real thing.
example.tran: 别买廉价的仿冒品，攒点钱买正品吧。

example.ex: ...a tight suit made of some cheap material.
example.tran: 用廉价面料做的紧身套装

entry.def: If you describe the cost of someone's work as cheap, you disapprove of the way people are taking advantage of a situation to pay someone less than they should for the work that they do.

example.ex: ...unscrupulous employers who treat children as a cheap source of labour.
example.tran: 把儿童当廉价劳动力使用的黑心雇主

entry.tran: (言行)讨便宜的，刻薄的，不怀好意的
entry.def: If you describe someone's remarks or actions as cheap, you mean that they are unkindly or insincerely using a situation to benefit themselves or to harm someone else.

example.ex: These tests will inevitably be used by politicians to make cheap political points.
example.tran: 这些测试必然会被政客们不失时机地拿去大做政治文章。

entry.def: If you describe someone as cheap, you are criticizing them for being unwilling to spend money.

example.ex: Oh, please, Dad, just this once don't be cheap.
example.tran: 哦，求求你，爸爸，就这一回，别抠门儿了。

entry.tran: 人命不值钱;人命如草芥
entry.def: You use life is cheap or life has become cheap to refer to a situation in which nobody cares that large numbers of people are dying.

example.ex: We will end up living in a society where life is cheap.
example.tran: 我们最终将生活在一个视人命为儿戏的社会。

entry.def: If someone does or buys something on the cheap, they spend less money than they should because they are more concerned with what it costs than with its quality.

example.ex: Most modern housing estates are terrible and inevitably done on the cheap.
example.tran: 现在的房子大多质量差劲透顶，肯定都是偷工减料盖起来的。

sentences.sentence: "their rich uncle treated them rather chintzily"
"a cheaply dressed woman approached him in the bar"

auth_sentence.content: How can anyone sell my childs future so cheaply?
auth_sentence.res_content: How can anyone sell my childs future so cheaply?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How can anyone sell my childs future so cheaply?

auth_sentence.content: The carbon can cheaply be put into nearby landfill sites.
auth_sentence.res_content: The carbon can cheaply be put into nearby landfill sites.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The carbon can cheaply be put into nearby landfill sites.

auth_sentence.content: They can perhaps be had a little more cheaply than before.
auth_sentence.res_content: They can perhaps be had a little more cheaply than before.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They can perhaps be had a little more cheaply than before.

sentences.en: Old bikes can be bought quite cheaply.
sentences.cn: 旧自行车很便宜就能买到。

sentences.en: Derelict inner-city sites could be sold off cheaply for housing.
sentences.cn: 荒废的内城区可以廉价出售用来修建房屋。

sentences.en: Competition in the market has led to goods being produced cheaply and a consequent deterioration in quality.
sentences.cn: 市场上的竞争导致了商品的廉价生产,随之质量也下降了。

sentences.en: I bought those new plates cheaply,and the pretty rose pattern has worn off already!
sentences.cn: 我买的那些新盘子倒是便宜,不过那美丽的玫瑰花花纹已经磨掉了!
